attributes.action: Legalize Teenage Marriage in the UK
attributes.additional_details: I consider that teenage marriage should be legalized in the UK as this will move the UK into another step towards freedom and give more open to neenagers. Teenagers may decide to marry for acceptable reasons like, love, interested in marriage and the most important reason is freedom.
attributes.background: I want the parliament to legalize teenage marriage in the UK

rejection.details: eighteen and nineteen year olds are already able to marry - it's not clear exactly what changes you want to the system.
